pullRequest.title: Bjorncs/reindexing cluster controller in config model

commit.message: Export reindexing config from configdefinitions bundle
Add option for adding reindexing support to cluster controller

Wire in reindexing support for cluster controllers (for hosted use case)

Reindexing is only supported when there is a separate cluster controller container per content cluster.
Only enable reindexing controller if feature flag is enabled

nodes.bodyText: Can use the default interface here?
That eliminates the need for nullity checks.

And we can send the timestamps for all documents when disabled, as the thing won't run anyway.
I think we should probably settle on using either signal for disabling it.

commit.message: Use dummy Reindexing impelmentation when reindexing is disabled
Specify document type status even when reindexing is disabled
